title: Yami Shibai 2 (Yamishibai: Japanese Ghost Stories 2)
synopsis: For the second time, the masked storyteller returns to tell children tales and legends of horror and woe, such as the tale of a ventriloquist's dummy, a locker that grants wishes, a capsule toy machine that returns lost possessions, and a strange food called Ominie-san.
staff: [['Iguchi, Noboru', ['Director']], ['Kumamoto, Hiromu', ['Script']], ['Hatsune, Miku', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Yamakawa, Norio', ['Planning']]]
